# Initialize on a new package

## Usage

```sh
git clone https://github.com/bluelief/pkg-init.git
cd pkg-init
python setup.py install
```

```sh
cd move/to/your/project/directory
package-init
```

or

```sh
cd move/to/your/workfolder
pkg-init package-name
```
